title: SQL 2
content: CREATE TABLE CPI_study_log{log_id int,user_id int,begin_time int,end_time int,);How many unique courses are there in ExamDB?Which Semesters of CPI101 course has exam?  SELECT COUNT(CourseName) FROM ExamDB GROUP BY CourseName;  SELECT DISTINCT(Semester) FROM ExamDB WHERE CourseName = "CPI101";
